The data relating to real estate for sale or lease on this web site comes in part from OneKey® MLS. Real estate listings held by brokerage firms other than Zillow, Inc are marked with the OneKey® MLS logo or an abbreviated logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing broker. 
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing.
Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: MOVE IN READY!!! THIS IS AN ENERGY EFFICIENT TESLA POWERED HOME WITH SOLAR PANELS THAT HAVE BEEN FULLY PAID FOR!!! Absolutely charming pre-war Colonial home in a New England style, featuring hints of decorative moldings and hardwood floors throughout. The entry way has a modern chandelier. The kitchen has been tastefully updated with wainscoting, granite counters, a goose neck faucet, subway tile back splash, kitchen drawers with the soft close feature, oversized stainless steel sink, and stainless steel appliances. This property also has a vaulted ceiling adorned with a skylight, accented with upper wall sconces, and a convenient walk-in pantry. The first floor offers a spacious living room, a designated dining area with a new overhead chandelier, a powder room, and a well-appointed office space. Both bedrooms are on the second floor. The primary bedroom features a large double closet with ample storage. BONUS SPACE!!! When you ascend to the attic using the pull down stairs; you will find that it is finished, spacious, well lit, and clean.     Step outside to a picturesque and expansive lawn area that graces both sides of the stone patio. The rear flagstone patio, bordered by lush shrubbery, is perfect for enjoying outdoor moments. The meticulously landscaped grounds create a fully fenced tranquil oasis. The grass is very healthy and there is side by side 2 car parking in the paver driveway. This property truly offers the best of both worlds: the charm and comfort of a townhouse with the independence of a single-family home. Please note that this home also has Tesla solar panels.    For commuters, the location is ideal, with a convenient 20-minute commute to NYC. Additionally, all essential shops are within close proximity. Don't miss the opportunity to own this gem of a property that perfectly blends classic elegance with modern living. Sellers are willing to accommodate a sellers concession.
